entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 59 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023
